fields.label: Notes
fields.message:
No default title (not sure if this is worth worrying about

When first loaded the display none does not work, the settings need to be saved first. This is pointless anyway as the filter needs to be on every page or else there is a JS error. This does need looking into. Also if there is no form on the results page no results are shown at all.

choices.none: Do not display filter on page
Do not display filter on page

sub_fields.label: Style Unique Identifyer
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_style_unique_identifyer
sub_fields.instructions: This field must be unique and containe no spaces

sub_fields.label: Filter Header Title
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_select_filter_header_title
sub_fields.instructions: This field must be unique and containe no spaces

sub_fields.label: Form Elements Height
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_element_height
sub_fields.instructions: Element height of button, checkboxes and dropdowns

sub_fields.label: Uppercase Text
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_uppercase_text
sub_fields.instructions: Element height of button, checkboxes and dropdowns

sub_fields.label: Additional CSS
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_additional_css
sub_fields.instructions:
Please prefix all styles with #filter-form-container and your unique identifier:

#filter-form-container.the-unique-id-of-this-style .filter-title { margin:10px; }

sub_fields.label: Container Margin
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_container_margin
sub_fields.instructions:
Use px or % unit:
top right bottom left
10px 0 15px 30px
or just
10px for the same all sides

sub_fields.label: Container Padding
sub_fields.name: sh_uc_filter_container_padding
sub_fields.instructions:
Use px or % unit:
top right bottom left
10px 0 15px 30px
or just
10px for the same all sides
